resources.string: Important : this action will disconnect the current access method. Make sure you close any file manager windows & unmount the device BEFORE starting!
Also, clear ALL running apps from the Recent Tasks list on your device, EXCEPT for this one of course =)
Result of setprop command shows here
Result of hsusb command shows here
When you\'re ready, flick the switch\n to change your connection method
You should now be able to access\n the SD Card from your PC …
Connection mode has been\n restored to normal
Initial checks indicate this app is incompatible with your device … there is nothing to do here!
Please do NOT access SD Card from both OSs simultaneously … this will result in DATA LOSS!
Check for Root at Startup. Causes a brief stall, but provides YOU with more control over the goings-on
Transfer Protocol when disconnected from UMS
